channel.title: Slayer Requirements [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
How can I make it so that Tormented Demons don't require a slayer level to kill?
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: Slayer Requirements [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Look for the npc id in Slayer.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Requirements [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Well, you could search your client.java for playerLevel[18] thats the slayer level, then from there keep searching until you find that near the Tormented Demons Id. For example, on my server it looks something like this for slayer monsters

if (type == 1616) { if (playerLevel[18] < 10) { sM("You must be level 10 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); break; } }
I would just delete that block of code. The (type == ####) is the part where you would have to find your tormented demons id

Read full topic
